multiplechoiceresponse.label: If you pass this course and pay for a verified certificate, where will you get your certificate?

choicegroup.choice: In the mail EdX does not mail paper certificates.
In e-mail EdX provides your certificate in such a way that you can get it even if you lose an e-mail.
This course does not give certificates This course makes both Honor Code and Verified certificates available.

div.p: About two weeks after the course ends, you will be able to receive your certificate in your dashboard. Click on your username at the top right-hand side of the page to go to your dashboard.
